name: _root words_
description:
Game made in the 2023 Global Game Jam with the theme: "Roots" by @ubehalaya, @ok_lavender, and @IcodeD4IM. Also won 2nd Place!

A mechanical being has gained root access to your device. As powerful as he is, he still cannot grasp the concept of root words. In order to get your device back, you must dive in your root directory and solve some root word based puzzles. Will you be able to get your device back?

All art assets made by Toast with Jam: https://ok-lavender.itch.io/

using LibreSprite: https://libresprite.github.io/#!/

Programming by @ubehalaya: https://ubehalaya.itch.io/

& @icoded4im: https://itch.io/profile/icoded4im

Font: https://managore.itch.io/m6x11

Footsteps SFX: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

Data Reveal Sound: https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/data-reveal-sound-6460/

Sound effects made using Chiptone: https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

Edit mode shader: https://godotshaders.com/shader/vhs-and-crt-monitor-effect/

The following music was used for this media project:

Music: Beauty Flow by Kevin MacLeod

Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/5025-beauty-flow

License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
